channel.title: Es6 on love-notes
channel.description: Recent content in Es6 on love-notes

item.title: But I Don't Wanna: Part 1
item.description: Part One: Getting Started First Things First: Everything’s Gonna Be Just Fine Hey, remember when ES6 first started coming on the scene and you were like: It started gaining traction, new libraries were being written in it, yet still you were like: Then friends, family, co-workers, and YouTube subscribers all started using it, and yet… It’s ok, little bird. I’m gonna tell you a secret: The most commonly used ES6 features are little more than shorthand syntax for the language you already know and love.
